articles.description: The Irishman was George Graham's assistant when the Gunners ended their 18-year wait for a top-flight title triumph in 1989.
articles.content:
Theo Foley, one of the heroes of Arsenals 1989 title winning triumph, has passed away at the age of 83.
Former Republic of Ireland international Foley was George Grahams former assistant at Arsenal … [+3187 chars]
